item.title: CPI 逼近，亚洲股市开局低迷：市场综述
item.description: 亚洲股市开盘不温不火，交易商在等待关键的美国通胀数据，以寻找美联储下周是降息还是按兵不动的线索。【原文：Asian shares were poised for a tepid opening as traders await key US inflation data for clues on whether the Federal Reserve will cut or hold rates next week.】

item.title: 主宰韩国的权势家族面临投资者的反抗
item.description:
该国的政治动荡加剧了提振低迷股市和改革强大企业集团的紧迫性。【原文：

The country’s political turmoil is increasing the urgency to boost its flagging stock market and reform its powerful conglomerates.

item.title: 中国召开年度经济会议制定经济刺激计划
item.description: 中国将于周三召开年度经济工作会议，制定明年的政策，最高领导人暗示将在与美国潜在贸易战的威胁下采取更有力的刺激措施。【原文：China is set to begin its annual economic work meeting on Wednesday to map out policies for next year, with top leaders hinting at more forceful stimulus amid the threat of a potential trade war with the US.】

item.title: 废柴工作室老板助推腾讯全球游戏雄心
item.description: 十年前，腾讯控股有限公司的 MoreFun Studios 曾濒临倒闭。如今，这家拥有 1600 名员工的公司及其领导人张恩佐（Enzo Zhang）已成为这家中国娱乐公司打造国际大片的核心。【原文：A decade ago, Tencent Holdings Ltd.’s MoreFun Studios was on the verge of collapse. Now the 1,600-strong operation and its leader Enzo Zhang are at the heart of the Chinese entertainment company’s ambitions to craft international hits.】

item.title: Adobe 的人工智能视频推广落后于 OpenAI 推出的 Sora
item.description: Adobe 公司推出人工智能视频产品的速度远远慢于 OpenAI 的竞争对手 Sora 服务，这加剧了人们对这家创意软件公司落后的担忧。【原文：Adobe Inc. is rolling out its AI video product much more slowly than OpenAI’s rival Sora service, fueling concerns that the creative software company is falling behind.】

item.title: 在 CPI 数据被视为美联储关键数据之前，债券交易员削减多头押注
item.description: 在周三的美国消费者价格数据公布之前，债券交易员们纷纷抛出筹码，选择了更为中性的立场，因为该数据将对美联储本月是否再次降息的预期起到决定性作用。【原文：Bond traders are taking chips off the table, opting for a more neutral stance before Wednesday’s US consumer-price data, which will be decisive in setting expectations for whether the Federal Reserve cuts interest rates again this month.】

item.title: 激进投资者 Alta Fox 将提名达克创力董事人选
item.description: 这位激进投资者在彭博激进主义论坛 2024 上表示，Alta Fox Capital Management LLC 计划在 2022 年首次入股达克创力公司（Daktronics Inc.【原文：Alta Fox Capital Management LLC plans to nominate director candidates to the board of Daktronics Inc. after first amassing a stake in 2022, the activist investor said at the Bloomberg Activism Forum 2024.】

item.title: TikTok 向用户支付购物费用，前提是他们能提高应用程序的下载量
item.description: TikTok 向用户提供数百美元，让他们在该应用上花时间，邀请朋友加入，并在 TikTok Shop 上购买产品，目的是在该应用可能在美国被禁之前尽快扩大业务。【原文：TikTok is offering users hundreds of dollars to spend time in the app, invite friends to join and purchase products on TikTok Shop, in an effort to expand the business as quickly as possible ahead of its possible ban in the US.】

item.title: 耶伦被提名后与贝森特交谈，对财政感到遗憾
item.description: 即将卸任的财政部长珍妮特-耶伦（Janet Yellen）表示，在当选总统唐纳德-特朗普提名斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）接任财政部长一职后，她与他进行了交谈。【原文：Outgoing Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen said that she spoke with President-elect Donald Trump’s nominee to be her successor, Scott Bessent, after he was tapped for the job.】

item.title: 激进分子安森入股狮门影业，可能推动出售事宜
item.description: 2017 年 8 月 6 日星期日，美国加利福尼亚州圣莫尼卡，狮门娱乐公司总部内的办公桌上显示着标牌。狮门娱乐公司定于8月8日发布财报数据。【原文：Signage is displayed on a desk inside the Lions Gate Entertainment Corp. headquarters in Santa Monica, California, U.S., on Sunday, Aug. 6, 2017. Lions Gate Entertainment Corp. is scheduled to release earnings figures on August 8.】

item.title: 关税逼近，加拿大央行决定大幅削减关税：决策指南
item.description: 加拿大央行很可能连续第二次降息半个百分点，使借贷成本降至更加中性的水平，并使经济更好地应对关税战可能带来的交叉影响。【原文：The Bank of Canada is likely to cut interest rates by half a percentage point for a second consecutive meeting, bringing borrowing costs to more neutral levels and better positioning the economy for the potential crosswinds of a tariff war.】

item.title: 被赶下台的首席执行官计划重返格罗弗，以结束可能出现的股权消灭现象
item.description: 陷入困境的设备租赁初创公司 Grover 的创始人一年前被迫离开公司，现在他正试图卷土重来，与可能会使投资者股权价值化为乌有的重组努力作斗争。【原文：The founder of the troubled device rental startup Grover who was forced out of the company a year ago is trying to stage a comeback by fighting a restructuring effort that may wipe out the value of investors’ equity.】

item.title: 审查发现，BLS 在错误发布美国数据后需要进行文化改革
item.description: 美国劳工统计局在发布了一系列糟糕的经济数据后委托撰写了一份报告，报告称美国劳工统计局对如何发布关键经济数据 "不够重视"，需要对该机构的文化进行改革。【原文：The US Bureau of Labor Statistics is “not sufficiently focused” on how it disseminates key economic data and a revamp of the agency’s culture is required, according to a report commissioned after a series of botched releases.】

item.title: 激进投资者 Ancora 支持 Amcor 84 亿美元的 Berry 交易
item.description: Ancora 在 "彭博激进主义 2024 论坛 "上表示，市场尚未认识到包装公司 Amcor Plc 上个月以 84 亿美元收购 Berry Global Group Inc.【原文：The market hasn’t yet recognized the value that will be created by packaging company Amcor Plc’s $8.4 billion takeover agreement last month for Berry Global Group Inc., Ancora said at the Bloomberg Activism Forum 2024.】

item.title: 华尔街对美联储调整关键工具的动机感到困惑
item.description: 美联储被认为有可能降低其帮助控制主要政策基准的工具之一的利率，尽管华尔街的一些人对此举背后的动机持怀疑态度。【原文：The Federal Reserve is seen likely to lower the rate on one of its tools to help control the main policy benchmark, though some on Wall Street are skeptical about the motivation behind the move.】

item.title: 随着上市临近，Klarna 的美国 IPO 名册上又增添了十几家银行
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Klarna Group Plc 在美国首次公开募股的公司名单中增加了约 12 家银行。【原文：Klarna Group Plc has added around 12 banks to the list of firms working on its US initial public offering, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 据说巴里克将为象牙海岸矿山寻找买家，因为金银价格飙升
item.description: 巴里克黄金公司（Barrick Gold Corp.）正在为其位于象牙海岸的Tongon金矿寻找买家，以期在金银价格飙升时出售这座老旧的金矿。【原文：Barrick Gold Corp. is seeking buyers for its Tongon gold mine in the Ivory Coast in an effort to sell the aging operation when bullion prices are surging.】

item.title: 苹果下一款超智能手表将能通过卫星发送短信
item.description: 苹果公司计划在 2025 年为其智能手表提供卫星连接，并正在加紧开发血压功能，以吸引徒步旅行者和注重健康的消费者升级其设备。【原文：Apple Inc. plans to bring satellite connections to its smartwatch in 2025 and is ramping up work on a blood-pressure feature, seeking to entice hikers and health-conscience consumers into upgrading their devices.】

item.title: 法国政治风暴引发不确定的商业前景
item.description: 法国的政治动荡使工业和建筑业的不确定性达到了自 2022 年能源危机以来从未有过的程度，给该国的经济前景蒙上了一层阴影。【原文：French political turmoil has driven uncertainty in industry and construction to levels not seen since the energy crisis in 2022, extending a shadow over the country’s economic outlook.】

item.title: 激进分子威胁逼近，Tinder 母公司 Match 面临扭亏为盈的高门槛
item.description: 本周三，Match Group Inc. 将召开首次投资者会议，激进分子和分析师们对该公司寄予厚望，等待该公司制定具体计划，扭转其旗舰约会应用 Tinder 用户数量持续下滑的局面。【原文：Match Group Inc. faces lofty expectations for its first investor meeting on Wednesday, as activists and analysts await a concrete plan for reversing persistent subscriber declines at the company’s flagship dating app, Tinder.】

item.title: 激进分子 Jana 推动保险公司 Markel 分离风险投资部门
item.description: 据激进投资公司管理合伙人斯科特-奥斯特菲尔德（Scott Ostfeld）称，Jana Partners 已积累了保险公司马可集团（Markel Group Inc.【原文：Jana Partners has amassed a stake in insurer Markel Group Inc. and is pushing the specialty insurance company to explore a separation or sale of its private investments business, according to Scott Ostfeld, managing partner at the activist investment firm.】

item.title: 拜登为经济记录辩护，称特朗普计划威胁经济增长
item.description: 美国总统乔-拜登警告说，共和党人唐纳德-特朗普延长减税和通过关税重塑全球贸易的计划有可能使经济成果发生逆转，而他对自己处理经济的不满也是上个月选举失利的原因之一。【原文：President Joe Biden warned that Republican Donald Trump’s plans to extend tax cuts and reshape global trade through tariffs risked reversing economic gains, even as dissatisfaction with his own handling of the economy contributed to last month’s stinging electoral loss.】

item.title: 二十国集团谈判代表支持南非推动解决非洲大陆债务问题
item.description: 世界最大经济体的谈判代表达成广泛共识，支持南非提出的 20 国集团优先事项，包括解决非洲国家令人担忧的高额债务问题。【原文：Negotiators for the world’s largest economies reached broad consensus to back South Africa’s G-20 priorities, including addressing the worryingly high debt of African nations.】

item.title: 拉扎德首席执行官认为 2025 年是资产管理的 "拐点
item.description: 拉扎德公司（Lazard Inc.首席执行官彼得-奥尔萨格（Peter Orszag）表示，明年将是该公司资产管理业务的 "拐点"，此前该公司公布的客户持股量每月都有小幅下降。【原文：Lazard Inc. Chief Executive Officer Peter Orszag said next year will be an “inflection point” for the asset management side of the firm’s business, after it posted a small monthly drop in client holdings.】

item.title: 亿万富翁内幕交易员乔-刘易斯的飞行员免于牢狱之灾
item.description: 亿万富翁商人乔-刘易斯（Joe Lewis）的一名私人飞行员因逃税而避免了牢狱之灾，他的逃税与他老板的内幕交易案有关。【原文：A private pilot for billionaire businessman Joe Lewis avoided prison for tax evasion tied to the insider trading case against his boss.】

item.title: 中国网络安全公司遭美国制裁，员工被起诉
item.description: 美国制裁了一家被指控为情报机构工作的中国公司，并指控该公司一名员工入侵全球数千家企业的计算机系统，其中包括美国关键基础设施公司。【原文：The US sanctioned a Chinese company it accused of working for intelligence agencies and charged one of its employees with hacking into the computer systems of thousands of businesses across the globe, including American critical infrastructure firms.】

item.title: McWin Capital 正在洽谈收购英国连锁面包店 Gail's
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，由交易商 Henry McGovern 和 Steven Winegar 掌舵的食品投资公司 McWin Capital Partners 正在洽谈收购英国连锁面包店 Gail's。【原文：McWin Capital Partners, the food investment firm helmed by dealmakers Henry McGovern and Steven Winegar, is in talks to buy UK bakery chain Gail’s, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Flat Footed 要求 Grifols 改革董事会以保护股东利益
item.description: Grifols 的非家族股东之一 Flat Footed 与对冲基金 Mason Capital Management LLC 一起呼吁对这家西班牙制药商的董事会进行彻底改革。【原文：Flat Footed, one of Grifols’ non-family shareholders, joined hedge fund Mason Capital Management LLC in calling for an overhaul of the Spanish drugmaker’s board.】
